Coding Resources

üêç Python Learning

Python Online Shell

Practice Python coding directly in your browser without installing anything.

Codecademy Python Course

Interactive lessons covering Python basics through advanced concepts.

Repl.it

Online IDE for Python and many other programming languages.

üåê Web Development

freeCodeCamp

Comprehensive web development curriculum with certificates.

MDN Web Docs

Official documentation and tutorials for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

CodePen

Online code editor for front-end development and experimentation.

ü§ñ Robotics & LEGO Programming

SPIKE Prime Software

Official programming environment for LEGO SPIKE Prime robots.

Pybricks

Python programming for LEGO robots - advanced programming option.

FLL Challenge Resources

Official challenge documents, rules, and updates from FIRST.

Practice Tables & Equipment

üèóÔ∏è Available Equipment

FLL Challenge Tables

Full-size competition tables available for team practice sessions.

  • Current season challenge setup
  • Previous years' challenges for skill building
  • Timer and scoring sheets included

LEGO Robot Kits

Complete robotics kits for building and programming.

  • SPIKE Prime sets with sensors
  • MINDSTORMS EV3 legacy support
  • Extra parts and accessories

Computer Lab

Dedicated computers for programming and research.

  • Latest software installations
  • High-speed internet access
  • Presentation equipment

For Team Members

Team Code of Conduct

ü§ù Respect & Inclusion

  • Treat all team members, coaches, and community members with respect
  • Embrace diversity and create an inclusive environment for everyone
  • Use appropriate language and behavior at all times
  • Listen actively and value different perspectives

üéØ Commitment & Responsibility

  • Attend scheduled practices and events regularly
  • Communicate in advance if you cannot attend
  • Complete assigned tasks and projects on time
  • Take ownership of your learning and growth

üåü Excellence & Growth

  • Strive for your personal best in all activities
  • Support teammates in achieving their goals
  • Learn from mistakes and view challenges as opportunities
  • Represent Lansing Tech Studio positively in the community

üîê Safety & Technology Use

  • Follow all safety guidelines when using tools and equipment
  • Use technology resources responsibly and appropriately
  • Protect personal and team information
  • Report any concerns to coaches immediately

For Parents

Registration Information

üìã How to Register

1

Complete Online Form

Fill out our registration form with student information, emergency contacts, and program preferences.

Register Now
2

Submit Required Documents

Provide liability waivers, medical information, and any special accommodation requests.

3

Pay Program Fees

Complete payment through our secure online system. Financial assistance is available upon request.

4

Attend Orientation

Join us for a parent and student orientation session before the season begins.

Team Information for Parents

Communication

  • Weekly email updates during season
  • Parent WhatsApp group for quick updates
  • Monthly parent meetings
  • Open communication with coaches

Volunteer Opportunities

  • Tournament judging and setup
  • Workshop assistance
  • Fundraising events
  • Transportation coordination

What to Expect

  • Regular practice attendance required
  • Project work between sessions
  • Tournament participation
  • Community service involvement

Support Your Student

  • Encourage consistent participation
  • Help with project research at home
  • Celebrate effort over results
  • Connect with other team families

Need More Information?

Have questions about our programs, resources, or how to get involved? We're here to help!
